title: AFK
body:
_**Hey i got afk because my game crash and the other players remake the game and i got AFK Is there any solution that i can do ???**_
and i hate to wait 20 min to play a game

replies.body:
The remake became available because you were inactive for at least 90 seconds before the 3 min mark. Since that vote ended up passing, the game was remade. There's a not a lot we can do now that the game was remade, but we should still take a look at what caused that afk to begin with. 

You mentioned the game crashed, but did you see any actual error messages at all? Hit me back up with those errors if you did see any, otherwise check up on the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).
